description:
Chris is truly the guy next door.

Yes, he's the next door neighbor of one of our talent scouts. After being asked three times to consider becoming an official Next Door Male, he finally gave in and now here he is for you to enjoy. Chris is a super nice guy who is mellow at first, but once he gets to know you, all bets are off... he's a wild man in bed.

He says that sometimes the length of his dick hurts the girls he's with while they're having sex, but he's learned how to handle it. We bet the women are crazy for you, Chris.
title: Chris
